notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: Propose a structure for the product with formula C9H17N that results when 2-(2-cyanoethyl)cyclohexanone is reduced catalytically.
